About me

I am currently a senior undergraduate student at BITS Pilani, K.K.Birla Goa Campus pursuing a dual degree in Msc Biology and B.E in Computer Science expected to graduate in 2023. Currently my interest lies in doing project in ML domain , particulary in field of Cognitive neuroscience(currently have a paper under review hope it gets published). I have also dabelled in the usecases of genetic algorithms in some of my personal miniprojects. In future i hope to move to work in research related to Data analytics and ML in applied sciences

I have also worked under some students organizations in my time during college : worked as organizing committee member of Spree, was part of astronomy club SEDS Celestia which regularly engages in sky obseravations; also was part of social activities with Abhigyaan
